title: I was recently at Carolina Beach and I saw that the go-cart track is no longer there.  Did they move someplace else on the beach?  If not are there any other go-cart traks in the area?  Who\'s bright idea was it to replace the go-carts with a volley ball pit?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18652
